attributes.action: Force Islington Council To Allow Disabled People Access To A TV Signal In Council Houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We pay a license fee for TV broadcasts, and as disabled people are home most of the time a tv signal is essential. 
Islington Council will not allow us to put are own aerials up, and will not  put a decent aerial up until 2012 for digital switchover.
We have to get Sky ( but we are not allowed to get a dish put up ), or cable, which is expensive on a limited buget. 
Why do I have to pay for something I can't get?
